title: Personal Website
description: This project is my personal website, serving as the hub for my portfolio. It also features a blog and showcases various personal interests, with occasional updates on my progress.

title: CGPP E-Apply
description: I developed the HR / administrative sections for the LGU City Government of Puerto Princesa's online job application portal, collaborated with a workmate who made the public view. This project significantly streamlined their recruitment process, directly enhancing operational efficiency for the local government.

title: CGPP LTS
description: The Legislative Tracking System for Puerto Princesa City Government currently archives finished legislation. Future updates will include creation, approval, and real-time tracking of legislative processes.

title: Palawena Travel and Tours | Admin Dashboard
description: For Palawena Travel and Tours, I collaborated with a team to develop the admin dashboard and integrated essential APIs for booking data and PayPal payments
